feature.correlation.discrete

Class DiscreteCorrelationCoefficient

  • java.lang.Object
    • feature.correlation.discrete.DiscreteCorrelationCoefficient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MutualInformation

    public class DiscreteCorrelationCoefficient
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the correlation coefficient for discretized data instances.
